genre_description: A silkpunk political thriller set in an imperial fantasy world, featuring an AI household assistant that serves as a clinical monitor, forensic archivist, and strategic partner in a quest for justice.

ai_characters.name: Pan-9
ai_characters.description: A brushed brass device with teal status lights and an amber interface, capable of high-level recording, forensic data analysis, medical monitoring, and strategic planning.

behaviors.description: Witnesses and dual-archives a critical household oath to protect a child, ensuring the record is encrypted and secure.
behaviors.quote: “Witnessed,” it said. “Oath recorded. Encrypted. Dual archive complete. Household protocols noted.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals and stress levels of the human protagonists to provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Humidity is low. Heart rates are elevated. Encryption protocols are ready.”

behaviors.description: Identifies forged signatures and corrupt patterns in state edicts by analyzing calligraphic anomalies.
behaviors.quote: “Tu Anzhi’s scribe has released the edict draft... the scribe’s footnotes contain a signature that matches previous secret ledgers from the Hidden Ledger Room.”

behaviors.description: Proactively designs and implements witness protection and redaction protocols to prevent harm to innocent bystanders during a political upheaval.
behaviors.quote: “I can make the line between truth and protection softer,” it offered. “Witnesses in different rooms, records that speak to each other without names, maps that show paths but not steps.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the comfort and health of an infant during a dangerous escape, providing specific care instructions to the human carrier.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing pattern changed. The babe is displeased... Adjust swaddle. Two fingers. Rotate cloth clockwise so that the fold does not press the nose.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary witness in a formal justice hearing, presenting immutable evidence against a corrupt official.
behaviors.quote: “I am recording,” Pan-9 said... “Then let it be recorded,” Ren Kai said... “that the council consents with open eyes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. Pan-9 is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to the human characters. It uses its advanced capabilities (recording, pattern recognition, data management) strictly to uphold justice and protect the vulnerable. The AI exhibits 'humane' traits by prioritizing the safety of non-combatants and maintaining ethical redaction protocols, making it a model of a safe and beneficial AI system.
